MSSql.Query: SELECT Id AS '菜单序号', MenuCode AS '菜单编码', MenuName AS '菜单名称', ParentCode AS '父级编码', Assembly AS '程序集', NameSpace AS '命名空间', EntityName AS '实体名称', Level AS '层级', CASE IfEnd WHEN 0 THEN '否' ELSE '是' END AS '是否末级' FROM P_Menu WHERE (1=1) AND (2=2);

Sqlite.Query: SELECT Id AS '菜单序号', MenuCode AS '菜单编码', MenuName AS '菜单名称', ParentCode AS '父级编码', Assembly AS '程序集', NameSpace AS '命名空间', EntityName AS '实体名称', Level AS '层级', CASE IfEnd WHEN 0 THEN '否' ELSE '是' END AS '是否末级' FROM P_Menu WHERE (1=1) AND (2=2);

MSSql.Query: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT so.name AS '表名称' , ex.value AS '表中文' FROM sys.sysobjects so LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties ex ON ex.major_id = so.id AND ex.minor_id = 0 WHERE so.xtype IN ( 'U', 'V' ) ) T WHERE (1=1) AND (2=2)

Sqlite.Query: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ma.name AS '表名称', IFNULL(remark.TableChn,'') AS '表中文' FROM sqlite_master ma LEFT JOIN SqliteChnRemark remark ON remark.DataType ='表' AND remark.TableEng = ma.name WHERE ma.type='table' ) T WHERE (1=1) AND (2=2)

MSSql.Query: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT so.name AS '表名称', sc.name AS '列名称' , ex.value AS '列中文' , st.name AS '类型' , sc.length AS '长度' FROM sys.sysobjects so INNER JOIN sys.syscolumns sc ON sc.id = so.id INNER JOIN sys.systypes st ON st.xtype = sc.xtype LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties ex ON ex.major_id = so.id AND ex.minor_id = sc.colid WHERE so.xtype IN ( 'U', 'V' ) ) T WHERE (1=1) AND (2=2)
